name: XEngine
short_description: XEngine is a platform- and rendering-API-independent 3D engine for real-time visualization with support for programmable graphics pipeline architectures implemented in C++. Platforms: Windows, Linux. APIs: OpenGL 1.3+, Direct3D 8.1, Direct3D 9.0
